name: Púca
description:
There's nothing better than enjoying a morning cup of coffee  on your farm, enjoying the fresh air and surveying your farm. Until you notice a Hare on your lawn. What happens when the chase leads you on an unexpected adventure...and the chase turns into a never ending run. Join the farmer on a 2D endless run adventure in Púca. Better learn to share.

This game was for: WeeklyGameJam / Week: 92 / Theme: One Direction

TEAM: Writer/Narrative: Felmuffin / Code: Run / Art: ShainaSenpaii / Audio: Dr_Monkfish
